properties.areaDesc: Rio Grande Valley of Eastern El Paso/Western Hudspeth Counties; Salt Basin; Otero Mesa; Northern Hudspeth Highlands/Hueco Mountains; Southern Hudspeth Highlands; Rio Grande Valley of Eastern Hudspeth County
properties.senderName: NWS El Paso TX/Santa Teresa NM
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 10 at 2:45PM MST until January 10 at 8:00PM MST by NWS El Paso TX/Santa Teresa NM
properties.description:
* WHAT...Winds of 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 45 mph.

* WHERE...The Otero Mesa in New Mexico and Hudspeth County Texas.

* WHEN...Winds will peak between 3 PM and 6 PM, diminishing after
8 PM. The strongest gusts will accompany brief rain showers.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
Tree limbs could be blown down. The strong winds could make
driving difficult especially along north/south running roads.
properties.instruction:
A Wind Advisory means that winds of at least 30 mph are expected.
Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high
profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING
